attributes.action: Allow Eurosceptic ministers the same access to resources as Pro-Eu ministers
attributes.additional_details: This is an affront to democracy and fairness that this debate must be held in and that Britain proudly upholds. Regardless of your point of view this is using public money and resources to further the careers and agendas of certain politicians over others. We must respect each other in this debate or else there is no point in holding it at all.
attributes.background: Eurosceptic ministers, assistants and civil servants are not being allowed to access resources that will assist them in their campaign whilst their opponents are. If we are to understand the truth of this debate both sides must be treated equally.
